attributes.title: Absolute
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible.  It lags and lags and lags.  It sucks😬. I don’t see why anybody would get it and if you do I don’t see how you use it.  It’s pointless🤢!  It’s probably the worst app out there.  It’s the biggest waste of time and effort. 👎🏻please don’t get it.  You will regret getting this app because it’s HORRIBLE !  😡

attributes.title: free barron 2020
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hopes of receiving updates about my dear rapists (sorry i meant president) campaign. instead, when i opened the app there was a video of mr. trump in a speedo poll dancing to one directions “steal my girl”. i realize that donald has lots of experience with trying to seduce and steal small children, but this was just too much for me. what’s worse is that after this horrible video played the uncontrollably for around 20 minutes, i am fairly certain that i then saw mr. trumps explicit pictures. i saw what looked to be an incredibly minuscule, over baked Cheeto. this was very inappropriate, and i will be forever scarred by this. i contacted a handful of the women that donald has tried to deny raping (even though it’s quite obvious that he did, in fact, rape them), and they confirmed that what i saw was indeed our leaders wang wang. i was completely taken aback and tried to delete the app off of my cellphone, but it seems that in the short amount of time that i had the app installed it had already uploaded the pole dancing video and mr. trumps nudes to my photos. i am now trying to get rid of this horrible app as fast as i can, but i can not find a way to delete donald’s explicit content. i would not want anyone to experience what i have had to endure, so this app must be removed from the app store immediately.
